argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cayley.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | cayley.h | |- H = ( SymGrp ` X ) |
| 3 |  | cayley.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | cayley.f | |- F = ( g e. X |-> ( a e. X |-> ( g .+ a ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | cayley.s | |- S = ran F |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` H ) = ( Base ` H ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 6, 2, 7, 4 | #P_cayleylem1 | |- ( G e. Grp -> F e. ( G GrpHom H ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ghmrn | |- ( F e. ( G GrpHom H ) -> ran F e. ( SubGrp ` H ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. Grp -> ran F e. ( SubGrp ` H ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( G e. Grp -> S e. ( SubGrp ` H ) ) |
| 12 | 5 | #P_eqimss2i | |- ran F C_ S |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( H |`s S ) = ( H |`s S ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_resghm2b | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` H ) /\ ran F C_ S ) -> ( F e. ( G GrpHom H ) <-> F e. ( G GrpHom ( H |`s S ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 12, 14 | #P_sylancl | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( F e. ( G GrpHom H ) <-> F e. ( G GrpHom ( H |`s S ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 8, 15 | #P_mpbid | |- ( G e. Grp -> F e. ( G GrpHom ( H |`s S ) ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 3, 6, 2, 7, 4 | #P_cayleylem2 | |- ( G e. Grp -> F : X -1-1-> ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_f1f1orn | |- ( F : X -1-1-> ( Base ` H ) -> F : X -1-1-onto-> ran F ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. Grp -> F : X -1-1-onto-> ran F ) |
| 20 |  | #P_f1oeq3 | |- ( S = ran F -> ( F : X -1-1-onto-> S <-> F : X -1-1-onto-> ran F ) ) |
| 21 | 5, 20 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( F : X -1-1-onto-> S <-> F : X -1-1-onto-> ran F ) |
| 22 | 19, 21 | #P_sylibr | |- ( G e. Grp -> F : X -1-1-onto-> S ) |
| 23 | 11, 16, 22 | #P_3jca | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` H ) /\ F e. ( G GrpHom ( H |`s S ) ) /\ F : X -1-1-onto-> S ) ) |
